|brand = MikroTik |model = RouterBOARD hEX |submodelappend = yes |submodel = S |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RB760iGS |page_start_date = May 16, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/MikroTik_RouterBOARD_hEX_S_(RB760iGS) |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621A; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 6C:3B:6B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RouterBOOT;;; |stockos = RouterOS;Level 4;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SFP, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = at |pwr_poe = 24 |pwr_poe_amp = 1.2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SFP, PoE, MicroSD Card slot |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.88.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- Leave blank --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt<!--LEDE Project, Padavan (unofficially)-->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/16/2018 |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <!-- "48RGEM04.0GALPC", "MikroTik hEX S" and "1805" is silkscreened on the board. --> *[http://wiki.mikrotik.com/wiki/MikroTik_News News on '''MikroTik''' Wiki] {{see also|MikroTik|MediaTek}}
*[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX S (RB760iGS)]] - ''Gigabit Ethernet Router'' :[https://mikrotik.com/product/hex_s RB760iGS] ('''hEX S''') - 5x GbE ports, USB 2.0, MicroSD, SFP, PoE, :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core, 16MB/256MB :1x USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, Flash (SPI), RAM Nanya (DDR3) <!--:OUI: [http://hwaddress.com/?q=6C:3B:6B 6C:3B:6B], "48RGEM02.0GALPC", "1633" ([[WNC]])-->
==Links of Interest== :[https://i.mt.lv/routerboard/files/hEX_S-180516115127.pdf Datasheet]
===Forum threads=== * [https://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=134353 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB760iGS'' on '''MikroTik''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:61633:4491#4491 ''MikroTik RouterBOARD RB760iGS'' on '''iXBT''' forums] <!--===Reviews=== *[http://lanmarket.ua/stats/obzor-obnovlennogo-Mikrotik-hEX-RB750Gr3:-luchshiy-marshrutizator-po-sootnosheniyu-cena-kachestvo Review on '''LanMarket'''] *[http://weblance.com.ua/280-obzor-marshrutizatora-mikrotik-hex-rev3-rb750gr3-apparatnyy-ipsec-moschnyy-dvuyadernyy-processor-256-mb-operativki-i-podderzhka-dude-server.html Review on '''WebLance''']-->

==See also== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/RB750Gr3 Product page] :[https://mikrotik.com/product/RB750Gr3 RB750Gr3] ('''hEX v3''') - 5x GbE ports, RouterOS L4 (6.36.1) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core, 16/256MB *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M11 (RBM11G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/m11g Product page] :Powerful small size OEM board with one GbE LAN and one miniPCIe slot :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), 3G/LTE modem supports :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 1x GbE LAN, 1x PCIe, 1x Mini SIM Card slot *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD M33 (RBM33G)]] - [https://mikrotik.com/product/rbm33g Product page] :Powerful OEM board with three GbE LAN and two miniPCIe slots :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621A (@880MHz, 2 cores), USB 3.0, M.2 (Key M) :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 3x GbE LAN, 2x PCIe, 2x Mini SIM Card slot
